head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWIS, THEODORE N., RABBI

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWIS, THEODORE N., RABBI

block.p: LEWIS-Theodore N., Rabbi. The New York Board of Rabbis mourns the death of its distinguished Past President, Rabbi Theodore Lewis, and extends its sincere condolences to his family, loved ones, and many students and former congregants. Rabbi Marc Gellman, Pres. Rabbi Gilbert Rosenthal Exec VP Armand Lindenbaum, Pres., Advisory Council
